description:
With tons of action and adrenaline, we bring you only the most exciting part of arcade soccer!
Play in single-player mode or local multiplayer. Up to 4 players can enjoy playing competitively or cooperatively across any game mode.

Play modes:
- Friendly match and penalty shootouts
- Tournaments - play the most important competitions!
- Career Mode! - create your team from scratch and lead it to glory!
- Party tournaments - have fun with friends and family!

Store:
As you play, you'll earn coins, which you can use in the store to purchase original items, such as balls, flags, stadiums, and also cosmetics for your players and teams... from unique hairstyles to a lion costume, anything is possible!

Available tournaments:
- Charrua Tournament and Charrua A and B Leagues
- America Cup, Europe Cup and Asia Cup
- Olymcharrua Cups (male and female)
- Global Cup (male and female)
- Global Cup 1930 (evoking the first international cup with a retro touch)
- USA Leagues (male and female), Eurochamp League and Liberty Cup

Characteristics:
- Easy to learn and enjoy, with clean and challenging gameplay.
- Two controls modes, to suit occasional players and also more experienced ones.
- Configurable assisted mode, to help you in the actions you prefer or disable it to increase the challenge.
- Fouls, free kicks, yellow and red cards, injuries, and penalties!
- Women's, men's, and mixed soccer.
- Short, long or through passes... directed, controlled or elevated shots... and also Chilean kicks, scorpion, scissors, pigeon header, etc.
- Manage team formation and strategy, player changes and much more.

Whether you are a soccer fan or not so much, this game will keep you entertained for hours!
Do you have what it takes to become a champion?
name: CHARRUA SOCCER - Pro Edition
